For the next issue of the News-Letter the regular
staff will be relieved of editorial responsibility and, in
keeping with tradition, will open its door in the Carroll
Barn to those freshmen interested in positions on the
paper and in putting out the year's second ,issue.
• Positions are open in news reporting, sports coverage,
creative feature writing, photography, cartooning, business and financial management, copy reading and headline, writing. Students interested in positions on the staff
are invited to inquire at the News-Letter table in Levering
Great Hall or at its offices in the Barn.
The annual freshmen editorial contest is open to all
freshmen with no limitations on topic or length. The
deadline is tomorrow at 8 p.m. The winning editorial
will be published in the all-freshmen issue Friday.
